Uses of Package
co.cask.cdap.api.workflow

  • Packages that use co.cask.cdap.api.workflow 
    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api.app
    An Application is a logical grouping of Streams, Datasets, Flows, Procedures, and other deployable elements.
    co.cask.cdap.api.schedule
    For running programs periodically.
    co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
    For constructing workflows.
    co.cask.cdap.internal.workflow
    This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.workflow used by co.cask.cdap.api.app 
    Class and Description
    Workflow
    Defines an interface for the Workflow.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.workflow used by co.cask.cdap.api.schedule 
    Class and Description
    ScheduleProgramInfo
    Represents name and type information of the program.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.workflow used by co.cask.cdap.api.workflow 
    Class and Description
    ScheduleProgramInfo
    Represents name and type information of the program.
    Workflow
    Defines an interface for the Workflow.
    WorkflowAction
    Represents an action that can be executed in a Workflow.
    WorkflowActionSpecification
    Specification for a WorkflowAction.
    WorkflowActionSpecification.SpecificationCreator
    Builder interface for the last stage of building a WorkflowActionSpecification.
    WorkflowConfigurer
    Configurer for configuring the Workflow.
    WorkflowContext
    Represents the runtime context of a WorkflowAction.
    WorkflowForkConfigurer
    Defines an interface for the fork in the Workflow.
    WorkflowNode
    Represents node in the Workflow.
    WorkflowNodeType
    Defines types of nodes in the Workflow.
    WorkflowSpecification
    Specification for a Workflow
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.workflow used by co.cask.cdap.internal.workflow 
    Class and Description
    WorkflowAction
    Represents an action that can be executed in a Workflow.
    WorkflowActionSpecification
    Specification for a WorkflowAction.
    WorkflowContext
    Represents the runtime context of a WorkflowAction.
